```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

## Exercise 1

```{r}
ggplot(data = storms) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = pressure, y = wind))

```

## Exercise 2

```{r}
# step 1
ggplot(data = storms) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = pressure, y = wind, color = category))

# step 2
ggplot(data = storms) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = pressure, y = wind, color = "green"))

# step 3
ggplot(data = storms) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = pressure, y = wind), color = "green")

# step 4
ggplot(data = storms) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = pressure, y = wind), color = "green", alpha = 0.2)

```

## Exercise 3

```{r}
msleep %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(bodywt, sleep_total)) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, NA))

```

## Exercise 4

```{r}
data <- tibble(x = 1:10, y = 1:10)

ggplot(data = data) +
  geom_blank(mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  coord_polar() +
  labs(title = "Polar coordinate system")

```

## Exercise 5

```{r}
storms %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(pressure, wind)) +
  facet_wrap(~ month)

```

## Exercise 6

```{r}
ggplot(storms) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = category))

```

## Exercise 7

```{r}
ggplot(storms) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = category)) +
  theme_minimal()

```

## Exercise 8

```{r}
library(urbnthemes)
set_urbn_defaults(style = "print")

ggplot(storms) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = category)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expand_scale(mult = c(0, 0.1)))

```

## Exercise 9

```{r}
storms %>%  
  filter(category > 0) %>%
  distinct(name, year) %>%
  count(year) %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = year, y = n)) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = year, y = n))

```
